episodes.title: He Convinced 39 People to Die for Him. Who Was Marshall Applewhite?
episodes.description:
🚀 In the late 1990s, a quiet mansion in California became the stage for one of the most disturbing cult events in American history. Heaven’s Gate, led by Marshall Applewhite, promised salvation through a spaceship trailing the Hale-Bopp comet. But how did a college music teacher convince 38 people to leave everything—and everyone—behind?

This Forgotten History episode dives into the bizarre blend of sci-fi, religion, and psychological control that defined Heaven’s Gate. From their castration rituals to their eerie farewell tapes, we uncover how a seemingly harmless spiritual movement transformed into a deadly cult. Written and hosted by Mike Droberg. Forgotten History is a 10th Legion Pictures Production.

💬 Comment below: Do you think something like this could happen again today?
